item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Solidus: The Wired Reflexes in Fallout 3, which I'll note McM did not much enjoy so more as like hasn't been plumbed for parody ideas, was even still based upon the Shadowrun concept in original, thus the Shadowrun example would still end up being the originator. Plus, it was already out before Fallout 3 was released.

item.title: Reference to...
item.content:encoded: This may also be a reference to the 'Wired Reflexes' perk that can be attained in Fallout 3, a combat module that directly affects the player's central nervous system. The description of the item, upon acquisition, reads, "Advanced technology from the Commonwealth has increased your reaction speed, giving you a higher chance to hit in V.A.T.S."

item.title: Reference to
item.content:encoded: I'm pretty sure this is a reference to Shadow Run, and the cyber ware 'Wired Reflexes'. Replaces normal nerves with high speed artificial ones.
